Package com.sanderjurgens.volvis.visualization

Class RaycastingRenderer

java.lang.Object
com.sanderjurgens.volvis.visualization.RaycastingRenderer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Renderer
Direct Known Subclasses:
AverageRenderer, CenterRenderer, IsovalueSurfacesRenderer, MaximumRenderer, TransferFunctionRenderer
public abstract class RaycastingRenderer extends Object implements Renderer
Abstract renderer based on a ray casting algorithm to render a 2D texture of the volume.
Author:
sanderjurgens

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    RaycastingRenderer(String name, RenderingTab renderingTab)
    Constructs a renderer to visualize the volume based on a ray casting algorithm to render a 2D image of the volume.

    • startSlicer

      protected void startSlicer(RaycastingRenderer rcr, int numThreads)
      Start the slicer and allow it to compute slices using an amount of slaves equal to the given number of threads and the slice method of the given renderer.
      Parameters:
      rcr - the given renderer, whose slice method should be used
      numThreads - the given number of threads

    • slice

      public abstract boolean slice(int startHeight, int endHeight)
      Produce a slice of the 2D image using a specific ray casting algorithm, from a given starting height up to and including a given ending height based on the number of compute threads.
      Parameters:
      startHeight - the given start height
      endHeight - the given end height
      Returns:
      whether the slicing was completed successfully
